name: Semi Sweet
description:
A light, crisp cider with just a touch of sweetness. Honey in color with notes of bergamot orange, lemon and apple, this refreshing cider reveals hints of citrus and cinnamon on the palate.

APPLES: Granny Smith, Fuji, Red Delicious, Golden Delicious, Gala
foodPairings: Cedar-plank salmon, fettuccine alfredo and cheeses including: Dubliner, Asiago, Parmesan and aged sharp cheddar.

style.name: Common Cider
style.description: Variable, but should be a medium, refreshing drink. Sweet ciders must not be cloying. Dry ciders must not be too austere. An ideal cider serves well as a “session” drink, and suitably accompanies a wide variety of food.

available.name: Year Round
available.description: Available year round as a staple beer.
